rules_text:
Create three 1/1 blue Advisor creature tokens.
Monument {2}{G}{U} [i](You may cast this transformed from your graveyard for its monument cost. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Repository of Thoughts.
At the beginning of each combat, you may move a counter from Repository of Thoughts to target creature.
